channel.title: The Prodigy on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in The Prodigy on Simba Tango

item.title: Death of the Prodigy dancer
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Mickal Tango is full of nostalgia, even sentimentality. We long for the times that were. Even sentimentality was better in the 40s. How can it be for the real milongueros, who were young in that time? Not to say it is the same, but the thought struck me the other day. I just bought the new Prodigy album, playing it loud and dancing around the kitchen. (I do this a lot, usually to tango music these days) This was the music of my youth, when we went out to party, that was the best.
